body.name: Laundry Detergent Sheets - 200 Loads, Lavender Scent, Compact, Lightweight, Eco-Friendly, Hypoallergenic, Portable, Save Space and Travel
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: Lower Cost: Up to 200 loads for as low as $0.05 a load. With those ultra-small to small loads in mind, we purposely cut the laundry sheets detergent into small sheets to avoid the trouble of tearing, and you can put 2 sheets in for larger loads. (200 sheets = 200 small loads = 100 large loads.）

Dissolves Easily: Water soluble laundry detergent sheets with upgraded surface actives for better dissolution in both cold and hot water, biodegradable and safe for septic tanks. Both conventional and HE washers can be used.

Zero Waste and Eco-friendly: We pack laundry soap sheets in a recyclable drawer kraft carton for easy access and green, say goodbye to disposable plastic packaging that pollutes our landfills and oceans, reduce the transportation of bulky liquid detergents, and choose compact and lightweight laundry sheets to reduce our carbon footprint.

Gentle to Sensitive Skin: Natural laundry detergent contains plant-derived ingredients, lavender scent effectively removes odor from clothes. Does not contain phthalates, chlorine bleach, phosphate and other materials, gentle and non-irritating, sensitive skin can also be used with confidence.

Space-saving and Travel-friendly: Compact and lightweight liquidless laundry sheets, compared to large plastic jugs of laundry detergent and washing powder, are more convenient to stock up and save space, so you can say goodbye to a messy laundry room. Traveling with a few sheets in your carry-on luggage is convenient without adding weight.

LANSIRY would rather increase their own cost, but also use decomposable recyclable materials and packaging products, refuse single-use plastic pollution, and make a small contribution to the protection of the earth. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love using these laundry detergent sheets. Takes less space than those bulky liquid containers and a lot less on the mess too! There's no spilling over or measuring. Just count the number of sheets you need per load size. And wow, look at the price!!! $10 for 200 sheets which can equal up to 200 loads or more. You can even cut them in half if needed. They are much easier for my teens to do laundry too. They dissolve quickly and more importantly for me, my grandson has sensitive skin and has not had an issue from using these in our laundry. Also, a pet peeve of mine is that it's impossible to get ever last drop out of the liquid containers. Using these sheets eliminates that waste. There's no telling how much detergent and money has been lost. Another important thing to mention is that using these sheets helps the environment. It eliminates all those plastic containers. I love that!So....Cost friendlyNo messNo wasteSensitive skin friendlySaves storage spaceEco friendlyI definitely recommend giving them a try. I believe you will be pleasantly surprised.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I LOVE THIS!!!!
reviews.reviewText: I don’t know how I missed this TYPE of product for so long? I TRY to do things I know will have less of an impact & protect the environment as much as I can. This is an AMAZING product that absolutely makes a difference for those who wash 15 or more loads of laundry every week! It works very well, clothes smell & actually ARE clean - and the package is either recycled cardboard, recyclable or BOTH! It’s reasonably priced & my #1 favorite household purchase. Thank you Amazon!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cleans well but no lavender scent
reviews.reviewText: This is my first time using detergent sheets. I've always been so worried that they won't work properly but these have worked great! They dissolve fully and quickly in warm or cold water. The clothes come out of the washer smelling fresh and clean. My only complaint is that the clothes do not smell like the sheets after washing, which is a shame because the lavender sheets smell AMAZING!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality ;cleans great
reviews.reviewText: Cleans clothes very well. I got the lavender scent. It was very strong when I opened the box for about a week, after that smell has lessened a lot. Funny, because it didn’t make my clothes smell that way. They are clean but no scent after washing. I’ve tried another brand but like this one better. Will continue to buy. Great price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy and convenient
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use and store. They are smaller than I imagined but clean just fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to like these sheets because of the price and convenience, but they only clean lightly soiled clothes in hot water. They don't remove stains in cold water. They dissolve just fine, and the water feels soapy, but the cleaning capabilities just aren't there. They do leave a light, fresh, and clean scent. I probably won't buy them again though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a game changer. It's lightweight. Good for the environment. Smells great. Good way to save money in these tough times. Will buy from now on...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for the Environment
reviews.reviewText: Bought to try. Good for lightly stained laundry not great on heavy soiled items. Good for the price and good for camping trips ( you have to use extra for more soiled items.
